title: Review: Ed Yong’s ‘An Immense World’ Is a Thrilling Tour of Nonhuman Perception
description: Ed Yong’s book urges readers to break outside their “sensory bubble” to consider the unique ways that dogs, dolphins, mice and other animals experience their surroundings.
dc:creator: Jennifer Szalai
category: An Immense World: How Animal Senses Reveal the Hidden Realms Around Us (Book)
